item.description:
This is not a hiking event but a lot of hikers will be there and some of our single members might enjoy it! Charlie's Active Singles hikes and events are for active single people in their 30's through 50's and average up to 100 people per event! These events have been found to be fun and well planned!

Saturday Feb 7th - 5PM to 11PM

Come join our hikers, cruisers & other singles organizations. This Hawaiian beach party features summer food: Ribs, Chicken, Hamburgers, Hot Dogs, many other hot & cold entrees, salads & many desserts. Beer, Wine & Soda, coffee, tea all included in the price.

Dress for the beach.

CASH PRIZES for (Best Hawaiian outfits)
door prizes, dance contests . . . for a night of fun

Our top rated DJ will bring you back to those summer days.
All styles of music. Whole place is a dance floor.

Held at the Lithuanian Club

24 Golway St.
Manchester CT.

860-645-8648

Directions (from Hartford and points West of Connecticut River):
* Take 84 East & get off at exit 63.
* End of ramp strait thru the 1st 4 way onto Oakland St.
* 1st light go right onto N. School St.
* About a half a mile turn right on Golway St.
* The Club is a short distance on the left.

Better turn-by-turn directions can be found at:
http://www.mapquest.c....


Please make checks payable to EECGLLC for $25: Mail to Charlie Gergley 19 Stony Hill Rd #6 Cheshire, CT 06410

Checks must be postmarked no later than 1/28 for $25 price. $35 after Post date up to & including payment at the door.


CONTACT: Charlie (organizer of Active Singles) Home 203- 271-2125, Cell 860-489-9611 for details. E-mail activesingles@snet.net

NO Children, Singles only (this doesn't mean you can't have a boyfriend or girlfriend).

No official Hartford Area Hiking leadership is planned to be at this hike. Just mingle with the other Active Singles (you're one!).

Active Singles is a 10 year old, non-profit Connecticut organization that brings together singles who enjoy participating in a variety of outdoor activities.

Active Singles
http://www.activesing...

=== Legal Stuff ===
By clicking on "Yes" or "Maybe" for this event you agree, warrant, and covenant as follows:

In consideration for accepting this entry, I, the registrant, intending to be legally bound, hereby, for myself, my heirs, my executors and administrators, do waive and release any and all rights for damages I may have against any parties or persons connected with the Hartford Area Hiking meetup group for and related to the above listed event. I attest and verify that I am physically fit to participate in any portion of this above listed event. I grant Hartford Area Hiking permission to use any photographs, film or videotapes of this event for any purpose.
item.how_to_find_us: May not be any hiking group leadership at the event... event is run by Active Singles organization.
